EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Motorpass application - Information regarding your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent application for a WEX Motorpass Account. In order to continue to assess your application we require proof of the existence of a partnership. Proof of the existence of a partnership must have both you and your partner's full name and address printed on it.
We accept the following documents as proof of partnership:
Joint TAX return A written partnership agreement
You can scan your documents (PDF or JPEG file format) and send them as an attachment to this email. Alternatively, you can post a copy to us at WEX Australia Level 3, 293 Camberwell Road, Camberwell VIC 3124.
Should you require any further information please contact me on {!User.MobilePhone}.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title}
WEX Australia Pty Ltd.
Level 3, 293 Camberwell Road, Camberwell VIC 3124
T: {!User.MobilePhone}
E: {!User.Email}
W: https://www.motorpass.com.au/
